10/ One of the most interesting things, but also perhaps disturbing, is how anonymous CCs will impact this group. If you give adults in modern economies stuff like Monero/Zcash, they'll typically do only 3 things: 1) blog about the tech, 2) buy drugs, or 3) speculate.

13/ But it will also fuel a dark and perverse economy. An unnamed Kik-account shows up with the text "Sandra I know your secret about XXX, send 3 XMR to XYZ by Saturday or I'll reveal it!". Kids will extort and bully each other, and derive money from it.
